references: J. H. Conway, The weird and wonderful chemistry of audioactive decay, in T. M. Cover and Gopinath, eds., Open Problems in Communication and Computation, Springer, NY 1987, pp. 173-188.

prog: (Haskell)  see Watkins link, p. 3.import Data.List (group)a034002 n k = a034002_tabf !! (n-1) !! (k-1)a034002_row n = a034002_tabf !! (n-1)a034002_tabf = iterate               (concat . map (\xs -> [length xs, head xs]) . group) [1]-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 09 2012
crossrefs: See the entry for A005150 for much more about this sequence.
Cf. A005341 (row lengths), A220424 (method B version).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
